message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we estimate its worth to be $1200000 to you. However, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a strategic price of $1100000. This offer is designed to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while maximizing value for both parties involved. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.
